input.sentences: the two boys started their day sneaking around the huge house trying to find a way through the fence .
when that did n't work out the went around the neighborhood and found this cool looking house .
they decided to look for a store to get some snacks but so far only found a bingo hall .
down the road they found a corner grocery and got some chips .
lastly they decided they should get headed home since it was starting to get late .
output.sentences: I started walking towards the church.
As I got closer I found that I had changed my mind.
I then redirected myself to the store.
After that I just wandered down the road.
Then the sun was stating to go down, so I walked back home.
